original_text: For if I cause you pain, who is there to make me glad but the one whom I have pained?
korean_text: 내가 너희를 근심하게 한다면 내가 근심하게 한 자밖에 나를 기쁘게 할 자가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: For if I cause you pain,
who is there to make me glad
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 기쁘게 할 사람이 누구 있겠습니까

sentences.original_text: but the one whom I have pained?
